label: Points Accrual & Redemption
description: Automated points tracking and intelligent redemption optimization delivering 25-40% higher value per point through AI-powered recommendations and dynamic pricing.

traditional.workflow: 1. Customer earns points after each flight, hotel stay with 2-4 week posting delay. 2. Customer must log in to loyalty portal to check point balance manually. 3. Customer searches for award availability using clunky calendar tools. 4. No guidance on optimal redemption value (may use 50K points for $300 flight when could get $800 value). 5. Points expire without warning, customer loses accumulated value.
constraints: 2-4 week delay in points posting creates confusion
Manual balance checking with no proactive alerts
Award search tools difficult to use (limited by blackout dates)
Customer gets 0.5-0.8 cents per point vs optimal 1.5-2.5 cents
30-40% of earned points expire unused
No personalized redemption recommendations

agentic.workflow: 1. Points Tracking Agent auto-captures all earning activity in real-time across flights, hotels, partners. 2. Expiration Monitor alerts customer 90, 60, 30 days before points expire with easy extension options. 3. Redemption Optimization Agent analyzes customer travel patterns and suggests high-value redemptions: 'Use 35K points for $850 business class upgrade vs $600 economy award'. 4. Dynamic Award Pricing shows real-time point costs with historical trends ('Current: 25K points, Avg: 30K, Book now!'). 5. Partner Points Transfer Agent recommends optimal transfers to partner programs for 40-80% value increase.
dataSources: Real-time points earning from all sources
benefits: 25-40% higher redemption value (1.5-2.5¢ vs 0.5-0.8¢ per point)
Real-time points posting vs 2-4 week delay
Partner transfer suggestions unlock premium redemptions

quickWins: Add redemption value calculator showing cents per point

label: Status Tier Management & Benefits
description: Proactive tier tracking with personalized challenges to achieve elite status increasing tier attainment by 30-50% and lifetime value through gamified progression.

traditional.workflow: 1. Customer discovers tier progress only when logging into loyalty portal. 2. Customer reaches end of year 5,000 miles short of elite status with no awareness. 3. Customer doesn't understand benefits of each tier (Gold vs Platinum). 4. Status expires annually - customer must re-qualify from zero. 5. No personalized path to achieve next tier.
constraints: Passive tracking - customer unaware of tier progress
30-40% of members fall 10-20% short of tier qualification
Benefits unclear - members don't understand value of upgrading
Annual reset frustrates customers close to qualification
No personalized challenges or accelerators
Missed revenue from customers who would book more if aware

agentic.workflow: 1. Tier Progress Agent sends real-time updates: 'You're 2,500 miles from Gold status (one round-trip to LA!)'. 2. Personalized Challenge Engine creates custom paths: 'Book hotel by month-end to earn 2x points toward Platinum'. 3. Benefits Explainer shows value of next tier: 'Gold members save avg $450/year in upgrades and lounge access'. 4. Double-Dip Optimizer suggests bookings that count toward multiple programs or promotions. 5. Status Extension Agent offers soft landing: retain status at 80% of threshold for one year (revenue protection).
dataSources: Member tier progress and earning history
Benefit value by tier (lounge access, upgrades)
Member travel patterns and booking frequency
benefits: 30-50% increase in tier attainment through proactive engagement
Real-time progress tracking vs quarterly statements
Clear benefit communication increases tier aspirations
Higher lifetime value from engaged tier members

quickWins: Send monthly tier progress emails with personalized paths

label: Partner Loyalty Integration
description: Seamless earning and redemption across airline, hotel, and credit card partners with unified wallet delivering 40-60% increase in points earning velocity through ecosystem integration.

traditional.workflow: 1. Customer has separate accounts: airline miles, hotel points, credit card points, car rental rewards. 2. Customer must manually enter loyalty numbers for each booking. 3. Customer can't combine points from different programs for redemptions. 4. Customer unaware of earning opportunities across partner network. 5. Points orphaned in low-value programs that customer rarely uses.
constraints: Fragmented loyalty with 5-10 separate accounts
Forgot to enter loyalty number - missed earning 20-30% of time
Can't pool points across programs for big redemptions
Unaware of partner earning (e.g., earn airline miles at hotels)
Low-balance accounts with insufficient points to redeem
Complex transfer rules and ratios difficult to understand

agentic.workflow: 1. Unified Wallet Agent aggregates all loyalty accounts in single dashboard: airline, hotel, credit card, dining, rental car. 2. Auto-Earning Agent automatically applies correct loyalty numbers at booking across all partners. 3. Points Pooling Engine shows combined purchasing power: '45K airline miles + 60K hotel points = 3 nights in Paris'. 4. Partner Opportunity Alert notifies of high-value earning: 'Stay at Hilton to earn 3x airline miles this month'. 5. Optimal Transfer Agent recommends best program transfers: 'Transfer 50K credit card points to airline for 60K miles (20% bonus)'.
dataSources: Car rental and dining program points
benefits: 40-60% increase in points earning velocity through partner capture
Zero orphaned accounts - all points have value

quickWins: Integrate top 3 airline and hotel partners into single wallet
prerequisites: Customer profile with all loyalty IDs

label: Personalized Rewards & Offers
description: AI-driven targeted offers and bonuses based on travel patterns delivering 3-5x engagement vs mass promotions and 20-30% incremental revenue.

traditional.workflow: 1. Loyalty team creates quarterly mass promotion: 'Double miles on all flights in March!'. 2. Same offer sent to all members regardless of behavior. 3. Offer awards double points to customers who would have booked anyway (wasted margin). 4. Offer doesn't motivate infrequent travelers who don't fly in March. 5. 2-5% engagement rate with no incremental behavior change.
constraints: Mass promotions create 60-80% waste (reward existing behavior)
Generic offers don't resonate with diverse member segments
2-5% engagement rate due to irrelevance
Quarterly cadence misses individual travel patterns
No incremental revenue - just rewarding planned bookings
Unable to measure true incrementality

agentic.workflow: 1. Behavioral Analysis Agent segments members by patterns: business travelers, leisure families, deal-seekers, dormant members. 2. Propensity Model predicts booking likelihood by route, date, and offer sensitivity. 3. Offer Generation Agent creates 1:1 personalized offers: 'Book Chicago trip by Friday for 5K bonus points (you search this route monthly!)'. 4. A/B Test Engine validates incrementality: only send offers that drive new behavior. 5. Real-Time Delivery sends offers at moment of intent: abandoned search, competitive price-shop, upcoming travel need.
dataSources: Member travel history and booking patterns
benefits: Real-time delivery at moment of intent
60-70% reduction in offer waste (no rewarding planned bookings)

quickWins: Create 5 behavioral segments with tailored monthly offers
prerequisites: Customer Data Platform with behavioral data

label: Gamification & Challenges
description: Achievement badges and limited-time challenges driving engagement and 25-40% increase in booking frequency through competitive and social elements.

traditional.workflow: 1. Loyalty program passively tracks miles and tier status. 2. No engagement between bookings - customer forgets about program. 3. No emotional connection or achievement recognition. 4. Loyalty communication limited to balance statements and promotions. 5. Program feels transactional, not experiential.
constraints: Zero engagement between booking transactions
No emotional loyalty or brand affinity
Members view program as purely transactional
Younger travelers expect gamified experiences
No viral or social sharing components
Loyalty seen as 'fly and earn points' only

agentic.workflow: 1. Gamification Engine creates achievement badges: 'Weekend Warrior' (5 weekend trips), 'Globe Trotter' (25 countries), 'Early Bird' (10 morning flights). 2. Challenge Agent offers limited-time missions: 'Book 3 flights in Q1 for 10K bonus points and exclusive badge'. 3. Leaderboard shows friendly competition with anonymized rankings or opt-in social sharing. 4. Surprise & Delight Agent rewards unexpected behaviors: 'You've stayed in 5 Hilton brands - here's Diversity Explorer badge + 5K points'. 5. Social Sharing enables badge showcase on social media with referral incentives.
benefits: 25-40% increase in booking frequency from engaged members
Viral social sharing drives 10-20% new member referrals

quickWins: Launch 5-10 achievement badges for milestone behaviors
Create quarterly challenges with bonus points

label: Elite Member Recognition & Service
description: Proactive VIP treatment and surprise upgrades for top-tier members delivering 50-70% increase in satisfaction and 3-5x higher lifetime value through personalized premium experiences.

traditional.workflow: 1. Elite member boards flight and receives standard service (no recognition). 2. Gate agent doesn't proactively recognize status or offer benefits. 3. Upgrades processed algorithmically with no personalization. 4. Elite member frustrated by lack of differentiation vs regular customers. 5. High-value member churns to competitor offering better recognition.
constraints: Inconsistent elite recognition across touchpoints
Algorithmic upgrades feel impersonal and random
No proactive service recovery for elite members
Staff unaware of member preferences and history
Elite members don't feel valued (same as non-elites)
20-30% elite churn due to lack of differentiation

agentic.workflow: 1. Elite Recognition Agent alerts staff when VIP checks in: 'Platinum member Jane Smith prefers aisle seat, champagne, traveling for daughter's graduation'. 2. Upgrade Optimization Agent prioritizes high-value members for complimentary upgrades based on lifetime value, recent travel, upcoming tier renewal. 3. Personalized Service Agent enables staff to deliver customized touches: favorite drink, newspaper preference, special occasion recognition. 4. Surprise & Delight Engine randomly awards unexpected perks: lounge access upgrade, free bag, priority boarding. 5. Elite Concierge provides white-glove support: dedicated phone line, proactive rebooking, service recovery.
dataSources: Elite member profile and tier status
benefits: 3-5x higher lifetime value from retained elite members

quickWins: Equip gate agents with elite member profiles on mobile app
prerequisites: Staff mobile app with member data

label: Loyalty Analytics & Segmentation
description: Advanced member segmentation and churn prediction enabling 40-60% improvement in retention through targeted interventions and predictive lifetime value models.

traditional.workflow: 1. Loyalty analyst creates quarterly report showing member counts by tier. 2. Analysis limited to basic segments: tier status, booking frequency. 3. No predictive analytics - only retrospective reporting. 4. Can't identify at-risk members until they've churned. 5. One-size-fits-all retention campaigns sent to all lapsed members.
constraints: Quarterly reporting means stale insights
Basic segmentation (tier only) misses nuanced behaviors
Reactive churn response after member already lost
No lifetime value prediction or prioritization
Mass retention campaigns waste budget on low-value members
Can't quantify ROI of loyalty investments

agentic.workflow: 1. Advanced Segmentation Agent clusters members by 20+ behavioral dimensions: booking patterns, channel preferences, price sensitivity, product mix, engagement level. 2. Churn Prediction Model scores each member's 90-day defection risk using ML. 3. Lifetime Value Agent predicts 5-year CLV for resource prioritization. 4. Intervention Agent triggers targeted retention: at-risk high-value member gets concierge call, low-value member gets automated email. 5. Analytics Dashboard provides real-time loyalty health metrics and ROI measurement.
benefits: 40-60% improvement in retention through predictive interventions
3-5x ROI on retention spend through CLV prioritization
Measurable loyalty program P&L and optimization

quickWins: Build churn prediction model for top-tier members
Create 10 behavioral segments with tailored strategies
